text: Hi support, I am facing a critical issue with the payment gateway. Error code 500.
Hi Alice, looking into this immediately. Can you share the transaction ID?
Confirmed it's a timeout on the bank side. I will escalate this to engineering.
Escalating to Tier 3. Need a Jira ticket for tracking.
I found a bug in the login page. The 'Forgot Password' link is broken.
Thanks Charlie. Can you reproduce this on Chrome?
